**The City of Groesbeck Convention Center**
has just opened its new, spacious and modern facilities for all types of Events and Meetings.  The beautifully decorated building consists of a 5000 square foot Grand Hall, a 1300 square foot Club Room and an outside Veranda.  The Groesbeck Convention Center is the largest City Owned facility available for rent, providing a safe and comfortable atmosphere.

![](https://www.cityofgroesbeck.com/upload/page/0051/images/GCC_grand_hall.jpg)
![](https://www.cityofgroesbeck.com/upload/page/0051/images/GCC_club_room.jpg)

![](https://www.cityofgroesbeck.com/upload/page/0051/images/GCC_kitchen.jpg)

Profession Warming Kitchen - offers stand up warmers, ice maker, glass front chiller, service bar and prep area.

[Follow this link for sample room layouts.](https://www.cityofgroesbeck.com/page/city.convetionctr_layouts)
